issues.description: The problem statement says fix_vec_dot returns void and writes its result to memory, but the template and solution stubs for fix_vec_dot_asm expect to return the dot product in EDX:EAX. Students will be unclear whether to store to memory or return in registers.
issues.suggested_fix: Align the return convention: either change the template stub to store the computed result at the provided output pointer and return void, or modify the problem statement to declare that the dot product is returned in EDX:EAX.

issues.description: The problem statement refers to the function `fix_vec_dot`, but both the template and solution code define and expect `fix_vec_dot_asm`. This naming mismatch can confuse students about which symbol to implement.
